== Blood smear ==
=> Activated mononuclear cells, characterised by a ''large size and hyperbasophilic cytoplasm = polymorphic cells, sometimes'' described as ''atypical'' = activated T lymphocytes.

=> Absence of blast cells

=> Other haematopoietic lineages are normal.

question.question: What are the characteristics of the blood smear in Mononucleosis syndrome?
question.option_b: Presence of activated mononuclear cells with large size and hyperbasophilic cytoplasm, and polymorphic cells
